name: Super Flying Gentleman
description:
The fate of Super Flying Gentlemen is in your hands!

Guide him thru the randomized world and achieve highest possible score!

Features:

  • Infinite level, inifinte fun!
  • Multiple difficulty levels!
  • Quick game session!
  • Outfits to unlock!
  • Varied obstacles to overcome!
  • Easy to play, hard to master!
  • Simple controls!
Controls:
  • SPACE - fire a rocket
  • D - boost
  • ESC/ENTER - pause game
Created with libGDX and Spine!

Low maturity
